concept.title: Data Processing Functions
concept.shortdesc: Data Processing Functions allow ingested raw data items to be parsed, data elements to be recognized and extracted, and the derived data to selectively tagged with metadata.

conbody.p: A DPF is associated with a data collection as part of data collection configuration. To associate the DPF with the data collection, you upload the DPF archive on the Data Collections page.

includes a library of helper functions to simplify DPF development. DPFs can be developed in either Java or Python, or can be extended to support DPF development in any modern programming language that runs on a Linux OS. No MapReduce or YARN knowledge is necessary. Your DPF can be written by PHEMI, by your organizationâ€™s in-house programmers, or by third-party developers. Training in DPF development is also available from PHEMI.
